biotools.summary: This R package analyzes high-throughput sequencing of T and B cell receptor complementarity determining region 3 (CDR3) sequences generated by Adaptive Biotechnologies' ImmunoSEQ assay.  Its input comes from tab-separated value (.tsv) files exported from the ImmunoSEQ analyzer.

bioschemas.name: LymphoSeq
bioschemas.summary: This R package analyzes high-throughput sequencing of T and B cell receptor complementarity determining region 3 (CDR3) sequences generated by Adaptive Biotechnologies' ImmunoSEQ assay.  Its input comes from tab-separated value (.tsv) files exported from the ImmunoSEQ analyzer.
